chainName().details: Gets the name of the chain this is deployed at

isTrustedAddress(string,string).details: Checks whether the interchain sender is a trusted address

returns._0: bool true if the sender chain/address are trusted, false otherwise

params.chain: Chain name to remove the trusted address for.

params.address_: Trusted address to be added for the chain.

trustedAddress(string).details: Gets the trusted address at a remote chain

params.chain: Chain name of the remote chain

returns.trustedAddress_: The trusted address for the chain. Returns '' if the chain is untrusted

trustedAddressHash(string).details: Gets the trusted address hash for a chain

returns.trustedAddressHash_: the hash of the trusted address for that chain

removeTrustedAddress(string).notice: Remove the trusted address of the chain.

setTrustedAddress(string,string).notice: Sets the trusted address for the specified chain.

documentation.text:
@notice Remove the trusted address of the chain.
 @param chain Chain name to remove the trusted address for.
